title: WEIBUMAOYI Men's Wide-Leg Jeans Straight Leg Carpenter Denim Pants Loose fit Trousers
description: DESIGN: Classic pockets, zip fly with button closure.ripped holes, slim through hip and thigh with a skinny leg. Zipper closure, slim fit, simple style, basic jeans you need everyday. With enough elasticity and soft cotton material, feels very comfortable and looks great after trying our skinny design denim jeans on
OCCASION: Such a skinny denim Jeans goes well with shirt,T-shirt,pullover,jacket.Simple style, suitable for dating, hanging out, work,school ,casual, party, outdoor activities or relaxing weekends.
Garment care: Recommended for gentle washing on the reverse side not suitable for hot water washing, hanging to dry.
Attention: Please be advised to see our size chart (not Amazon size chart)for the most accurate fit. One of your own dress would be a great reference of size fitting.
